com.pwn9.filter.engine.rules

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pwn9.filter.engine.rules.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChainEntry

    public class Rule
extends Object
implements ChainEntry
    Rule object

    Each Rule has a single match Pattern, an ArrayList of Condition's and an ArrayList of Action's

    $Id: $Id

      • getConditionsMatching

        public Set<String> getConditionsMatching(String matchString)
        Find all conditions in all RuleChain entries that match the passed string. Eg: if matchString = "permission", and a rule has this condition: "ignore|require permission foo|bar|baz", return: {"foo","bar","baz"}
        Specified by:
        getConditionsMatching in interface ChainEntry
        Parameters:
        matchString - Condition to match
        Returns:
        Set of unique String objects in all conditions of this chain.
